#summary Documentation of the Rend_Factory_Database_Pdo_Mysql class
#labels Factories,Phase-Implementation

= Description =
This class is an [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abstract_factory_pattern Abstract Factory] for the [http://php.net/pdo_mysql pdo_mysql] [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.db.html#zend.db.adapter Zend_Db_Adapter].

= API =
|| *Method* || *Description* ||
|| `__construct(/* array | Zend_Config */ $options)` || A !Zend_Config object or array matching the setter names ||
|| `create()` || Create an instance of a [http://framework.zend.com/manual/en/zend.db.html#zend.db.adapter Zend_Db_Adapter] class ||

= Examples =
== Basic ==
Basic usage of the `Rend_Factory_Database_Pdo_Mysql` is to create an instance of the factory and call it's `create()` method on demand.

{{{
class MyController extends Rend_Controller_Action {
    protected $_database;
    public function init() {
        $factory = new Rend_Factory_Database_Pdo_Mysql(array(
            'host'     => 'localhost',
            'username' => 'test',
            'password' => 'test',
            'dbname'   => 'database'
        ));
        $this->_database = $factory->create();
    }
}
}}}
